segments.text: Madam , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Next week there will be a meeting with the manager of USE Company ; this is an important opportunity for our company to have a new relationship with a new partner . So , I want you to prepare an instruction book with detailed introduction of our products . This introduction will be presented in the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Remember to add an agenda for this meeting and show our warm welcome to them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about adding some pictures of our products for the introduction ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea ! The pictures will illustrate the performance of our products vividly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will prepare it right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A , do your best , it's very important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please trust me . I will finish it very well .
segments.speaker: S1
